ref: 5150 járati ʻ makes old, grows old ʼ RV., ʻ is dissolved, is digested ʼ Yājñ. &rcirclemacr Pa. jarati ʻ grows old, decays ʼ; Pk. jaraï ʻ becomes old or worn out ʼ; B. jarā ʻ to become worn out ʼ; Or. jaribā ʻ to be worn out, be dissolved (of salt), be absorbed (of water, oil, &c.), be digested ʼ; G. jarvũ ʻ to be absorbed, subside, be digested ʼ; -- Pk. jarijjaï ʻ becomes old ʼ, Sh. ǰarižóĭki̯.
